SUBTITLE: Your portal to the essential tools for creation and innovation.
SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Search for a tool or click a tag...
NO_TOOLS_DESC: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria.

VSCODE.NAME: VS Code
VSCODE.DESC: A powerful, lightweight code editor for modern web development.

FIGMA.NAME: Figma
FIGMA.DESC: The collaborative interface design tool for teams.

POSTMAN.NAME: Postman
POSTMAN.DESC: The complete platform for API development and testing.

NOTION.NAME: Notion
NOTION.DESC: The all-in-one workspace for your notes, tasks, wikis, and databases.

GITHUB.NAME: GitHub
GITHUB.DESC: Where the world builds software. Millions of developers and companies build, ship, and maintain their software on GitHub.

DOCKER.NAME: Docker
DOCKER.DESC: Securely build, share and run any application, anywhere.

CANVA.NAME: Canva
CANVA.DESC: Create beautiful designs with your team. Use Canva's drag-and-drop feature and layouts to design, share and print business cards, logos, presentations, and more.

PHOTOSHOP.NAME: Adobe Photoshop
PHOTOSHOP.DESC: The industry-standard graphic editor for photo manipulation and image editing.

SPLINE.NAME: Spline
SPLINE.DESC: A friendly 3D design tool for the web.

SLACK.NAME: Slack
SLACK.DESC: Team communication and collaboration in one place.

TODOIST.NAME: Todoist
TODOIST.DESC: The to-do list to organize work & life.

RAYCAST.NAME: Raycast
RAYCAST.DESC: A blazingly fast, extensible launcher. Complete tasks, calculate, share common links, and more.

CLEANSHOT.NAME: CleanShot X
CLEANSHOT.DESC: The ultimate screen capturing tool for Mac. Capture, annotate, and share effortlessly.

1PASSWORD.NAME: 1Password
1PASSWORD.DESC: The easiest way to store and use strong passwords.

WARP.NAME: Warp
WARP.DESC: A blazingly fast terminal built in Rust, reimagined from the ground up.

JIRA.NAME: Jira
JIRA.DESC: The #1 software development tool used by agile teams.

HUGGINGFACE.NAME: Hugging Face
HUGGINGFACE.DESC: The AI community building the future. Build, train and deploy state of the art models powered by open source machine learning.

STEAM.NAME: Steam
STEAM.DESC: The ultimate destination for playing, discussing, and creating games.

EPIC.NAME: Epic Games
EPIC.DESC: A digital storefront for PC and Mac games, often offering exclusives and discounts.

WEGAME.NAME: WeGame
WEGAME.DESC: Tencent's global game open platform, providing one-stop services for developers and players.

ALI213.NAME: Ali213
ALI213.DESC: A professional single-player game portal providing news, downloads, and guides.
